summary: Adds some staves and wands you can cast whatever spell you want with. Including ones from other mods. The idea behind them is that you can use the staves charges instead of magicka.
descriptionHtml:
Staff Casting v 0.4

SKSE is required.

[b]Feature[/b]
Adds some staves and wands you can cast whatever spell you want with. Including ones from other mods. The idea behind them is that you can use the staves charges instead of magicka.

[youtube]fUwYxT4j4dY[/youtube]

[b]How to get it[/b]
Craft them at the forge.

[b]Change spell[/b]
Equip a spell in the hand where you have the staff equipped.

[b]Spells that do not work[/b]
[list]
[*]Concentration spells
[*]Bound weapon spells
[*]Master cast spells (disabled for balance reasons)
[/list]
The scripts will disallow casting of these kinds of spells but can only detect vanilla spells. If you have a mod which adds those kinds if spells you will be able to cast them, but the result might be bugged.

[b]Known bugs[/b]
[list]
[*] It can not detect un-vanilla concentration, 2H nor bound spells.
[/list]

[b]Credits[/b]
Kryptonian - Meshes and textures.
J3X - Everything else
Drop me a message at jex_ mus [at] hotmail [dot] com if you want anything.
Or contact me at SkyrimNexus as J3X.

[b]Permission[/b]
Clone, copy, spread, mutate, merge, and do whatever you want just as long you give me credit for my work.
If you upload this mod to any other site (don't upload to sites that make money from mods) please make sure that it's updated and link back to this site.
You do not need to ask for permission to use any parts of this mod.
If you create a modification to this mod please release it.
If you manage to fix some bug or add a new awesome feature please let it be included in this mod as well.


[b]I am no longer modding Skyrim but still provides tech support over email or PM.[/b]
[img]http://www.catalope.co/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/test2_.png[/img]
I run a small game studio called Catalope Games, if you enjoy my mods please check it out.
